conbody.p: MapReduce executoroverviewexecutorsMapReduceThe MapReduce executor triggers a MapReduce job in HDFS each time it receives an event record. Use the MapReduce executor as part of an event handling branch of the pipeline. Use the MapReduce executor to process files from Hadoop

You can use the MapReduce executor to trigger a MapReduce job that converts Avro files to Parquet for more efficient storage and access. You can also use the executor to trigger custom MapReduce jobs. Note that MapReduce executor does not monitor jobs.

conbody.p: When you configure the MapReduce executor, you specify MapReduce connection and configuration properties as well as job details. When using the Avro to Parquet job, you also specify details such as the output file directory and optional compression codec.
